oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Studio Recordings - Merle Haggard - 1966 - 1972
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Capitol records unreleased masters of Merle Haggard. Also includes dubs from released masters later in Haggard's career at end of tape.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Merle Haggard; The Strangers;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) White Line Fever (master number 77204 recorded on 1969-04-09) / (02:56) Hang Up My Gloves (master number 56059 recorded on 1966-06-02) / (05:40) Jimmie The Kid (master number 71717 recorded on 1969-01-22 and released by Bear Family) / (07:48) Trouble In Mind (master number 74246 recorded on 1970-04-06) / (11:10) I'll Be A Hero When I Strike (74246 on 1970-03-25) / (13:20) You Don't Need To Love Me (But I'll Always Care) (master number 77664 recorded on 1971-09-11) / (16:53) When My Conscience Takes Over - Possibly not Haggard (master number 80770 recorded on 1972-10-17) / (19:11) There You Go Again - Possibly not Haggard (master number 80774 recorded on 1972-10-18) / (21:47) News Break (master number 58692 recorded on 1967-11-17 and released by Bear Family) / (23:15) California On My Mind (master number 72200 recorded on 1969-04-08) / (25:59) Lookin' For My Mind (master number 59749 on 1968-05-09 and released by Bear Family) / (28:17) I Ain't Got Nobody (master number 74206 recorded on 1970-03-23) /
(30:28) excerpt of New Spanish Two Step (info not listed) / (30:56) That's The Way Love Goes (info not listed) /
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Haggard, Merle; Capitol Records, Inc; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
